name: Colosse
description: 'COLOSSE' is a real-time virtual reality storytelling experience. A hunter crosses paths with a mysterious titan.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit (recommended), Windows 8.1 64 bit, or Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-6400 / i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290/390 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: It's free... it's great. It shows what they can do in VR, it's really good. Short but good... that's what she said.
short and booring. not worth it.
It's a short cartoon, but it IS free. I highly recommend. Especially if you have kids. My nephew LOVED it and so did I.

This is a great take on storytelling in VR, with the framing in each scene done very well. Scale of the world feels right, which is definitely a big part of this demo, while the soundscape is great as well. Really a great glimpse into the power of a proper experience.
A very cool experience that gives you a massive sense of scale and a really cool art style. Definitely worth your time, especially as it only takes about 5 minutes.
Great mystical story. Simple yet beautiful visuals
This is a very interesting little experience. It's free and it looks very nice. Try it. There's no reason not to.
